<title level="1" right="Action">[Opportune Riposte](/Actions.aspx?ID=551) <actions string="Reaction" /></title>

<traits>
<trait label="Swashbuckler" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=321" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 86 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Trigger** A foe within your reach critically fails a Strike against you.

</column>

---

You take advantage of an opening from your enemy's fumbled attack. You either make a melee Strike against the triggering foe or attempt to [Disarm](/Actions.aspx?ID=41) it of the weapon it used for the Strike.
name: Opportune Riposte
